nodes.label: let cpi_accounts = Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . nft_mint . to_account_info () , from : ctx . accounts . nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;
let data = & mut ctx . accounts . energy_data ;
data . total_energy = data . total_energy . checked_add (energy_per_nft) . unwrap () ;
data . last_burn = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
emit ! (EnergyAward { user : * ctx . accounts . user . key , gained : energy_per_nft , total : data . total_energy , at_timestamp : data . last_burn , }) ;
